\DefMacro{lc_1_desc}{Short sentences with neutral adjectives and nouns}
\DefMacro{lc_1_predicates}{$Seed\leftarrow$\textbf{hasattr}(length,<10)$\land$
\textbf{hasattr}(label,neutral)$\land$(\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,neutral\_adj)$\lor$
\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,neutral\_noun))$\land$~\neg(\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,positive\_adj)$\lor$
\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,positive\_noun)$\lor$~\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,negative\_adj)$\lor$
\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,negative\_noun))}
\DefMacro{lc_2_desc}{Short sentences with sentiment-laden adjectives}
\DefMacro{lc_2_predicates}{$Seed\leftarrow$\textbf{hasattr}(length,$<$10)$\land$((\textbf{contain}
(tag\_of\_pos,positive$\_$adj)$\lor$\textbf{contain}
(tag\_of\_pos,positive$\_$noun)
$\land$\textbf{hasattr}(label,positive))$\lor$(\textbf{contain}
(tag\_of\_pos,negative$\_$adj)$\lor$\textbf{contain}(tag\_of\_pos,negative$\_$noun)$\land$\textbf{hasattr}(label,negative)))}
\DefMacro{lc_3_desc}{Sentiment change over time, present should prevail}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates1}{$Seed\leftarrow$\textbf{combine}(prefix1,$S_{pos}$,infix,postfix1)$+$\textbf{combine}(prefix2,$S_{neg}$,infix,postfix2)}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates2}{prefix1$:=$``Previously, I used to like it saying that''|``Last time, I agreed with saying that''|``I liked it much as to say that''}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates3}{$S_{pos}\leftarrow$\textbf{hasattr}(length,<20)$\land$\textbf{hasattr}(label,positive)}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates4}{infix$:=$``but''|``although''|``on the other hand''}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates5}{postfix1$:=$``now I don't like it.''|``now I hate it.''}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates6}{prefix2$:=$``I used to disagree with saying that''|``Last time, I didn't like it saying that''|``I hated it much as to say that''}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates7}{$S_{neg}\leftarrow$\textbf{hasattr}(length,<20)$\land$\textbf{hasattr}(label,negative)}
\DefMacro{lc_3_predicates8}{postfix2$:=$``now I like it.''}

\DefMacro{lc_4_predicates1}{$Seed\leftarrow$\textbf{replace}($S$, ``is'', [``is not'',``isn't''])$+$\textbf{replace}($S$, ``are'', [``are not'',``aren't''])}
\DefMacro{lc_4_predicates2}{$S\leftarrow$\textbf{hasattr}(clause,`(This|That|These|Those)~(is|are)')$\land$\textbf{hasattr}(label,negative)}
